rukus.text: 72|1|Ni shuo:“Wo ceng feng dao qishi: You ji ge jingling yijing jing ting, bingqie shuo:‘Women que yi tingjian qiyi de “gulanjing”,
72|2|ta neng dao ren yu zhengdao, gu women xinyang ta, women jue bu yi renhe wu pei women de zhu.
72|3|Zansong women de zhu de zunyan! Chaojue wanwu, ta meiyou ze qu qi shi, ye meiyou ze qu ernu.
72|4|Women zhong de yong yu, chang yi beimiu de shi wumie an la,
72|5|women ceng caixiang ren he jingling jue bu wumie an la.
72|6|Ceng you yixie nanren, qiu xie nan jingling baohu tamen, yin'er shi tamen gengjia jiao'ao.
72|7|Naxie nanren ceng xiang nimen yiyang caixiang an la jue bu shi renhe si wu fuhuo.
72|8|Women ceng shitan tian, faxian tianshang bu man jianqiang de weishi he canlan de xingsu.
72|9|Guoqu, women wei qieting er changchang zuo zai tianshang ke zuo di difang. Xianzai shei qu qieting, shei jiu faxian yi ke canlan de xingsu zai dengzhe ta.
72|10|Women bu zhidao, jiujing shi da dishang de wanwu jiang zao huannan ne? Haishi tamen de zhu yu yin tamen yu zhengdao ne?
72|11|Women zhong you shanliang de, you ci yu shanliang de, women shi fen wei xuduo paibie de.
72|12|Women xiangxin, women zai da dishang, jue buneng shi an la wunai, ye jue buneng taobi an la de qianze.
72|13|Dang women tingjian zhengdao de shihou, women yi xinyang ta. Shei xinyang zhu, shei bupa kekou, ye bupa shouru.
72|14|Women zhong you shunfu de, you guaizhang de. Fan shunfu de, dou shi youzhiyu zhengdao de.
72|15|Zhi yu guaizhang de, jiang zuo huo yu de ranliao.”
72|16|Jiaru tamen zunxun zhengdao, wo bi shangci tamen de fengfu de yushui,
72|17|yibian wo yi yushui kaoyan tamen. Shei tuibi zhu de jiaoxun, ta jiang shi shei ru zai yanjun de xingfa zhong.
72|18|Yiqie qingzhensi, dou shi an la de, gu nimen yingdang qidao an la, buyao qidao renhe wu.
72|19|Dang an la de puren qilai qidao de shihou, tamen jihu qunqi er gong zhi.
